scripts.headed bdd start.feature: export HEADLESS=N && ENV=QA wdio run wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@web_demo'
scripts.headed bdd webint.feature: export HEADLESS=N && ENV=QA wdio run wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@web_interact'
scripts.headless bdd api.feature: export HEADLESS=Y && ENV=QA wdio run wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@api'
